mapper.select: select * from product order by productNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into product values ( seq_product.nextval, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDescription}, #{vendorNo}, #{vendorName}, #{attachInfo}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update product set productName = #{productName}, productPrice = #{productPrice}, productDescription = #{productDescription}, vendorNo = #{vendorNo}, vendorName = #{vendorName}, attachInfo = #{attachInfo} where productNo = #{productNo}
